name: @rabhan/platform
description: RABHAN Solar BNPL Platform - Complete SAMA-compliant solar energy financing platform for Saudi Arabia

scripts.start: concurrently -n "auth,user,contractor,document,quote,admin,marketplace,proxy,web,admin-ui" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,red,orange,purple,white,gray" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:contractor" "npm run start:document" "npm run start:quote" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:marketplace" "npm run start:proxy" "npm run start:web" "npm run start:admin-ui"
scripts.start:backend: concurrently -n "auth,user,contractor,document,quote,admin,marketplace,proxy" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,red,orange,purple" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:contractor" "npm run start:document" "npm run start:quote" "npm run start:admin" "npm run start:marketplace" "npm run start:proxy"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: concurrently "cd backend/services/auth-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/contractor-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/document-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/quote-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/admin-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/marketplace-service && npm install" "cd backend/services/document-proxy-service && npm install"
scripts.install:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/rabhan-web && npm install" "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm install"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: concurrently "cd backend/services/auth-service && npm run build" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm run build" "cd backend/services/contractor-service && npm run build" "cd backend/services/document-service && npm run build" "cd backend/services/quote-service && npm run build" "cd backend/services/admin-service && npm run build" "cd backend/services/marketplace-service && npm run build" "cd backend/services/document-proxy-service && npm run build"
scripts.build:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/rabhan-web && npm run build" "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm run build"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: concurrently "cd backend/services/auth-service && npm test" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm test" "cd backend/services/contractor-service && npm test" "cd backend/services/quote-service && npm test"
scripts.test:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/rabhan-web && npm test" "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm test"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: concurrently "cd backend/services/auth-service && npm run lint" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm run lint" "cd backend/services/contractor-service && npm run lint" "cd backend/services/quote-service && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/rabhan-web && npm run lint" "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm run lint"
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: concurrently "cd backend/services/auth-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd backend/services/contractor-service && npm run lint:fix" "cd backend/services/quote-service && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.lint:fix:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/rabhan-web && npm run lint:fix" "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm run lint:fix"
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.typecheck:backend: concurrently "cd backend/services/auth-service && npm run typecheck" "cd backend/services/user-service && npm run typecheck" "cd backend/services/contractor-service && npm run typecheck" "cd backend/services/quote-service && npm run typecheck"
scripts.typecheck:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/rabhan-web && npm run typecheck" "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && npm run type-check"
scripts.migrate: npm run migrate:auth && npm run migrate:user && npm run migrate:contractor && npm run migrate:quote && npm run migrate:admin && npm run migrate:marketplace
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run migrate
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:root
scripts.clean:backend: concurrently "cd backend/services/auth-service && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd backend/services/user-service && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd backend/services/contractor-service && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd backend/services/document-service && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd backend/services/quote-service && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd backend/services/admin-service && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd backend/services/marketplace-service && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd backend/services/document-proxy-service && rm -rf node_modules dist"
scripts.clean:frontend: concurrently "cd frontend/rabhan-web && rm -rf node_modules dist" "cd frontend/admin-dashboard && rm -rf node_modules dist"

author: RABHAN Development Team
